resources.string: Set Current location as base location
Save Current Location As Base Location
This app is designed to help you keep track of the location of your device. Features include:
Get alert upon exiting the set boundary distance

Press the \"on\" button in the top left corner to enable live updates, so you can run the app in the background to get notified if you exit the boundary. To set your location to your home, or \"base\" location, click the \"Save current location as base location\" button. Choose the limit distance using the buttons next to the distance number, the small buttons change the value by 0.01, and the large buttons change by 0.1(both in miles). Click the \"Distance\" button to find your current distance from your home location. Clicking \"Refresh Location\" will set the location on the map to your current location. The app automatically updates your current location every two minutes if you have \"On\" enabled.
Coded by Caleb Brown, for MW AOCS 2020
Parents, enter a 4 digit code (Don\'t Forget it!!) for the alert deactivation.
